name: Bubu The Space Engineer
description:
This is the 2D Platformer Project for the Coursera Course Game Design and Development 2 - 2D Platformer

Added Features:

  1. Animated and functional portal.
  2. Functional ladders.
  3. New deadly trap spikes.
  4. New assests (portals, ladders, windows, spikes).
  5. 2 new levels.

Made by : Mehmet Yiğit EROL
